attributes.description:
Carpointe- At Tavcor George we believe in first class customer service. 
All our Vehicles undergo a 80 Point Mechanical Check, AA Roadworthy Test and is Accident free unless advertised as otherwise. 
We do accept trade-ins of all Makes and Models. 
We have dedicated Finance Managers that can arrange finance for you should you want to finance the vehicle. We also offer Value Added Products like Service and Warranty Plan Extensions. 
We deliver Nationwide and charge a delivery fee depending on the distance of delivery. 
Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R4000, Lic /Reg of R781, Number plates of R400.
